author: Jeff Poor, Jeff Poor
title: Fmr U.S. Ambassador to Japan Hagerty: China Handling of Coronavirus 'Crime of the Century' -- 'Greatest Cover-Up in Human History'
description: China's handling of the early stages of the coronavirus pandemic has raised questions about the communist nation's priorities, where it seemingly put its own domestic politics ahead of the global public health. According to former U.S. Ambassador to Japan Bil…
